1917: 1917 Guy Bolton & PG Wodehouse's musical "Have a Heart" premieres in New York
1927: 1927 Royale Theater (Golden, CBS Radio Playhouse) opens at 242 W 45th NYC
1966: 1966 "Daktari" African adventure series premieres on CBS TV
1988: 1988 ABC premiere of fact-based "Evil in Clear River"
1990: 1990 Actor Joseph Cotton (84) undergoes cancer operation to remove his larynx
